title: Anyone can help me identifying this font?
content:
Hello,

Please kindly help me on identify the font name of this name.  
Thanks in advance.

- Wilb.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215224107im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Authentic_4406.jpg)
author: wilb

comments.content:
Sorry, don't know this one and really doubt it could a font, more a custom lettering as almost all MLB and baseball scripts.  
Fonts tagged as "baseball" at MyFonts: [http://www.myfonts.com/search/baseball/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215224107/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/baseball/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/baseball/fonts/")  
Some I like for your sample: [Fenway Park](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215224107/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jukebox/fenway-park-jf/), [Mascot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215224107/http:/mvbfonts.com/mvb_mascot/mvb_mascot/),
Thanks Ryuk, really appreciate your help on this. -Wilb.
